title: Create website for Airbnb property Veebirstays

requirements.text: Create a landing page showcasing the Airbnb property with property name 'Veebirstays' and listing details from https://www.airbnb.co.in/rooms/1582766952093298603
acceptanceCriteria: Page includes property photos in a gallery or carousel
Page shows key property details (location, capacity, amenities)
Page is responsive and works on mobile and desktop

requirements.text: Display property amenities and features including WiFi, kitchen facilities, and other amenities mentioned in the Airbnb listing
acceptanceCriteria: Amenities are displayed in an organized, scannable format
Icons or visual indicators accompany each amenity

requirements.text: Include a booking section with a call-to-action button that links to the Airbnb listing URL https://www.airbnb.co.in/rooms/1582766952093298603
acceptanceCriteria: Prominent booking button is visible on the page
Button links to the correct Airbnb listing URL
Button opens in a new tab

requirements.text: Create a property details section showing location information, guest capacity, bedroom/bathroom count, and property type
acceptanceCriteria: Guest capacity and room details are shown
Information is easy to read and well-organized

requirements.text: Implement a cohesive visual design with a warm, inviting aesthetic using earthy tones (terracotta, warm whites, sage green) and clean typography that reflects hospitality and comfort
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses warm, welcoming tones
Overall design feels cohesive and inviting
Layout emphasizes property photos and key information

nonGoals: Building a custom booking system (link to Airbnb instead)
Creating a backend reservation management system

required: Hero banner image showing a welcoming vacation rental property exterior or interior with natural lighting (hero-property.dim_1920x800.png)
Placeholder amenity icons set including WiFi, kitchen, parking, and TV in a consistent style (amenities-icons.dim_600x400.png)
